title: Flights & Flatbread with Pride Mountain
description:
Join us on Tuesday, November 11, from 4–8 PM at Whispering Vine Fourth Street for a special evening featuring the highly acclaimed wines of Pride Mountain Vineyards, one of California’s most celebrated mountain estates straddling the Napa–Sonoma county line. Enjoy a curated flight paired with flatbread while tasting through the powerful yet refined style that has made Pride a cult favorite.

Reserve Your Spot

Tasting Fee: $50 (Includes a flatbread and tasting)

Featured Wines:

• Pride Mountain Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2020 – 95 pts Wine Enthusiast – Silky, concentrated, and beautifully polished with blackberry, black cherry, cedar, bergamot, and black pepper depth.

• Pride Mountain Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – 93 pts Wine Enthusiast – Structurally bold yet floral and lifted, showing currant, plum, and juicy berry fruit with mountain-grown freshness.

• Pride Mountain Cabernet Franc 2021 – 93 pts Wine Enthusiast – Deep and expressive with Amarena cherry, cocoa, mint, caramel, and velvety richness.

• Pride Mountain Merlot 2022 – 94 pts James Suckling – Opulent and refined with blackberry, black cherry, bay leaf, chocolate, and long, luxurious tension on the finish.

Experience one of Napa/Sonoma’s most iconic mountain wineries—paired with flatbread and poured alongside the people who love it most.
